name: Expresso
description: Arabica coffee beans. Strong black coffee made by forcing steam through ground coffee beans.

name: Bunny latte
description: Coffee made with espresso and hot steamed milk, milkier than a cappuccino..

name: Chai latte
description: Made with spiced tea by brewing black tea in water and adding steamed milk

name: Matcha latte
description: A tea latte made with green matcha tea powder and steamed milk.

name: Macarons
description: Feeling like something small to fix your sugar cravings? Why not have a macaron.

name: Bunny hop Sandwich
description: Made with freshly baked bread and fresh veggies, to provide you a balanced meal

name: Souffle
description: You must try our delicious fluffy souffles, with fresh cream and berries on top

name: Crossiant
description: Can't go wrong with a crossiant baked on the same day.
